original_query: select MIN(p1.toNode) from dblp p1, dblp p2a, dblp p3a, dblp p3b, dblp p4a, dblp p4b WHERE p1.toNode = p2a.fromNode AND p2a.toNode = p3a.fromNode AND p3a.toNode = p4a.fromNode AND p3a.toNode = p4b.fromNode AND p2a.toNode = p3b.fromNode
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.ToNode=E4.FromNode)
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E1 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E2E4.FromNode=E1.ToNode)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E3.ToNode=E6.FromNode)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E3E6.ToNode=E5.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E1E3E6E5 AS SELECT MIN(FromNode) AS EXPR$0 FROM E2E4E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E6E5 WHERE E2E4E1.ToNode=E3E6E5.FromNode)
